texto: 8.4.3 Output The output from management reviews should include decisions on such matters as: — i mprovements i n the e ffe c tivene s s a nd e ffic ienc y o f the d i s pute -re s olution, complai nts -ha nd l i ng and other processes, and in products and services; — competence, performance and suitability of the current dispute-resolution provider; — de a l i ng with identi fie d organ i z ationa l ne e d s and defic ienc ie s (e . g. tra i ni ng pro gram me s) relate d to dispute resolution. Records of management reviews should be established and maintained.
